text.name: sys_description
text.text: The 3DS is Nintendo's eighth generation portable console, with the particularity of auto-stereoscopic 3D display without glasses. It is equipped with a dual core ARM11 268 MHz processor and an ARM9 134 MHz for backward compatibility DS, a GPU Nvidia 268 MHz, 128MB of RAM and internet. It displays 400x240 in 3D, 320x240 for the touch screen and offers virtual surround sound equivalent to 5.1. The NEW version released in 2014 will have an 804 Mhz 4-core processor, 128 MB of RAM, a camera, the ZL and ZR buttons as well as exclusive games like Xenoblade Chronicles and Fire Emblem Warrior.
